created_time: August 01, 2022, 06:04:06 PMLast edit: August 04, 2022, 01:50:34 PM by jeremypwr
content: Arsenal + Southampton + São Paulo FCThursday + Friday + Saturday Football Prediction Contest!Game 1:  São Paulo FC v Ceará (Thursday Wednesday)Game 2:  Arsenal v Crystal Palace (Friday)Game 3:  Southampton v Tottenham (Saturday)Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  1-0 São Paulo FCGame 2:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 3:  20'  3-0 SouthamptonPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mBTC Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mBTC!(Small print)* Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
